page.title: 15HOUSING IN LEEK
page.content: LEEK HAS MANY DIFFERENT TYPES OF HOUSES THROUGH WHICH CAN BE TRACED THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE TOWN AND THE SURROUNDING AREA. IN THE TOWN CENTRE CAN BE SEEN THE TERRACED HOUSES WHICH WERE BUILT AT THE TIME OF THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE TEXTILE INDUSTRY IN LEEK.MOST OF THESE HOUSES HAVE NOW BEEN "MODERNISED" THAT IS THEY HAVE HAD BATHROOMS FITTED AND TOILETS HAVE BEEN BROUGHT INDOORS, THE ORIGINAL TOILETS WERE BUILT AT THE TOP OF THE YARD. THERE ARE ALSO SOME LARGE HOUSES IN THE TOWN CENTRE WHICH WERE BUILT FOR THE MILL OWNERS. ON THE OUTER EDGE OF THE TOWN NEW HOUSING ESTATES HAVE BEEN BUILT IN THE LAST TWENTY YEARS. THESE WERE BUILT TO SATISFY THE DEMAND FOR PRIVATE HOUSES. THAT IS HOUSES OWNED BY THE PEOPLE LIVING IN THEM. (CONT'D)
